job_tasks.phrase: improving the current infrastructure landscape by automation
job_tasks.justification: Automation of infrastructure tasks falls under the umbrella of software development practices applied to operational environments.

job_tasks.phrase: building and expanding (new) systems and platforms
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the creation and development of new technical systems and platforms.
Modifying and improving existing infrastructure is a software development activity focused on maintenance and upgrade.

job_tasks.phrase: infra delivery to our internal customers
job_tasks.justification: Delivering infrastructure services to internal customers requires development and management of those services.

job_tasks.phrase: carrying out life cycle management of systems and software
job_tasks.justification: Managing the lifecycle of systems and software involves development, maintenance, and eventual retirement phases.

soft_skills.phrase: Is something missing or could something be better? Go ahead, do it differently.
For us is learning the same as calling. You are responsible for your own development, so you decide how, what and when you develop yourself!
What will you learn with us
For us, learning is just as normal as telephoning. You are responsible for your own development and you decide how, what and when you learn. We support you in this!

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on infrastructure improvement, automation, and general system lifecycle management, which aligns with software development (TASK4) but lacks specific details related to AI or GenAI tasks. The emphasis on soft skills like initiative and learning is present, but the core technical focus does not align with the defined profiles of ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer.
